u.a: <aft> takes man from car and sets on floor , holding him <1w-5w> moves car around floor .
takes one man from car and puts in one hand . takes other man from car and puts in other hand . reaches in dollhouse , takes out bed and puts on floor .
reaches in dollhouse and takes out another bed . sets bed next to other bed on floor
<1w> puts beds together like bunk beds
<aft> takes beds apart , puts man in bottom bed and then puts back together . turns bed
reaches in dollhouse and takes out lawn chair . holds chair and man in hands
<aft> reaches to side . puts chair on floor
<aft> puts lawn chair facing self . puts man in chair . manipulates man in chair
<1w> reaches in dollhouse , takes out man and puts him in chair
reaches in dollhouse and fumbles around
<aft> sets table in front of man in chair
extends oh a long time , rising and falling
<1w> reaches in dollhouse , takes out chair and sets on other side of table , reaches in dollhouse and takes out man .
puts man back in chair . holds man and chair at table
reaches in dollhouse , takes out another chair and sets at table
reaches in dollhouse , takes out man and sets on floor
takes man from chair to meet Betty's man and pretends man speaks . puts man back in chair
tries to put man in chair but chair falls , holding man to chair
<1w> sets chair right and helped Betty put man in chair
picks up bed and puts man in
<1w> takes man from bed and begins to put him in lawn chair but goes to table instead
moves man to meet Betty's man . pretends man speaks
puts man back in chair . holds man and chair at table
<1w> reaches in dollhouse , takes out man and puts on floor
moves man to meet Betty's man . pretends man speaks
manipulates man on floor . lays him down
<1w> puts man back in chair , reaches in dollhouse .
<1w> takes out benches which are stuck together , manipulates benches to get them apart and succeeds
<1w> reaches in dollhouse and picks up chicken .
<1w> takes chicken out and sets on floor , holds chicken in hand
<1w-6w> sets benches side by side on floor .
<1w-4w> sets benches side by side on floor .
<1w> reaches in dollhouse , takes out man and sets in bench
<bef> reaches in dollhouse , takes another man out and sets in bench
<aft> picks up man from lawnchair . picks up man from bed
<1w> holds ladder so Betty can see
puts man at bottom of ladder and makes him climb to top of ladder
<1w> walks man to benches and puts him in <1w> sits man up in bunk bed .
<1w> moves man to side . moves man back to meet Mother's man . <1w> reaches to put man on floor .
<1w> moves man near bench . manipulates man on floor
takes man from bench , meets Betty's man and puts back in bench
takes man from bench and holds out to speak to Betty's man
moves man as if to speak
<1w> puts man from other hand on bench .
<1w> long oo sound , rising and falling
<1w-4w> pretends to speak <1w> moves bunk bed . man falls out . walks man near benches .
takes man from bench . moves chicken near bench
<dur> raises chicken up and down <bef> puts finger in mouth .
moves man from chair as if to speak
<1w> picks man up from chair and moves him around in the air .
<1w> picks man up from chair and moves him around in the air .
<aft> puts chicken on floor <dur> takes chicken from car . <bef> puts finger to mouth .
<1w> moves grill in dollhouse and puts man next to it <1w> circles finger over house .
<aft> reaches in dollhouse and takes out grill , knocking the ladder down . puts grill on floor outside dollhouse and sets man next to it
manipulates man next to grill and then draws him near table and then back to grill
leans over to examine table top
